title: Energy conservation - large and small sphere t1 t2

content.question: A small negatively-charged sphere is in motion near a large, stationary, positively-charged sphere, as shown in the figure. At time <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, the small sphere is close to and moving directly away from the large sphere. At a later time <math alttext="t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, the small sphere is still moving directly away from the large sphere. If gravitational forces are negligible, which of the following correctly compares both the two-sphere system’s electric potential energy <math alttext="U" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>U</mi></math> and the small sphere’s kinetic energy <math alttext="K" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>K</mi></math> at times <math alttext="t sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="t sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="U sub 1 is greater than U sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub 1 is greater than K sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="U sub 1 is greater than U sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub 2 is greater than K sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="U sub 2 is greater than U sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub 1 is greater than K sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="U sub 2 is greater than U sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>U</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="K sub 2 is greater than K sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>
